content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 23), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は左上付近(約3,3)にいる。自軍空母は中南部(13,23)。勝利には先に敵空母を発見する必要がある。航空機の射程22を活かし、空母は無理に前進せずまずは両機を異なる探索扇状に発艦して広く索敵する。BSQ1を北西方向、BSQ2を北方向へ発艦して早期発見を狙う。空母は発見後に安全な距離へ若干移動して第二波を整える。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 3, "y": 6}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (3, 6) while at (13, 22).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 23), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 22), outbound toward (3, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "BSQ1は北西へ向かい索敵中。BSQ2を別方向へ発艦し索敵範囲を広げ、発見確率を上げる。BSQ2はより北寄り（やや西寄りもカバー）に向けて発艦する。空母は現位置で温存し、敵発見後に最適位置へ移動する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 5, "y": 5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (9, 14) while at (11, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (5, 5) while at (13, 22).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (9, 14) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (13, 23), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 18), outbound toward (3, 6), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 22), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1発見で敵航空隊の位置把握。ASQ1は敵空母近傍か北西方面から来た可能性あり。まずは敵空母を直接索敵するため、BSQ1を発見位置のさらに北西（敵空母初期推定3,3周辺）へ向かわせる。BSQ2はより西寄りへ振って並行索敵。空母は現位置維持して航空隊の帰還・交戦後の再発艦に備える。発見時の交戦は往路のみ発動するため、到達経路で敵空母を捉えられる座標を目標に指定する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 4, "y": 4}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "両航空隊は既に発艦済みで再発艦不能。現在は展開中の索敵情報を活かし空母をやや北西へ接近させ、航空隊の索敵圏を拡大して敵空母の早期発見を狙う。空母を1〜2ヘクス前進（北西方向）させ、安全圏を維持しつつ捜索効率を上げる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 11, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (8, 13) while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 17) while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (8, 13) while at (11, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 17) while at (11, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (10, 15) while at (11, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (9, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (8, 13) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (11, 17) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (10, 15) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (12, 22), en route to target (11, 21), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 14), engaging an enemy target at (8, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 18), outbound toward (8, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母を発見・接近して交戦中。BSQ2も同座標へ向かっており航空攻撃で敵空母を集中攻撃できる好機。空母は直ちに無用に近づかず現状維持またはわずかに後退して敵の反撃（敵機の帰還経路での発見）から逃れるべきだが、現状BC1は北西へ接近済みで視界圏外からの支援が可能。敵航空隊も近接しているため、自軍空母は敵の索敵圏外へ退避させつつ航空隊の帰投を待ち、被害を最小化して次波を整える。よって空母は現在地点よりやや南（安全方向）へ1ヘクス移動させる。航空機は既に行動中のため変更なし。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 12, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 21 damage while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 19) while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 18) while at (9, 14).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 20) while at (9, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 18) while at (9, 15).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 21) while at (12, 23).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 19) while at (12, 23).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (8, 13) while at (8, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (8, 13) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 77/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (12, 21) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 19) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (12, 23), en route to target (12, 23), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 14), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (8, 15), outbound toward (8, 13), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母にヒットして帰還中。敵航空隊が近接しており、空母は索敵されている可能性が高い。BSQ1はHP低く着艦保護が必要。BC1は現状位置（12,23）に留まりまずはBSQ1を着艦させつつ、BSQ2は敵空母追跡中なので帰還/攻撃完了まで支援位置を維持する。敵機が接近しているため空母は大きく移動せずそっと後退して被発見リスクを抑える：1ヘクス南へ移動して着艦帯を安全側にずらす。発艦命令はなし（両機行動中/帰還中）。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 12, "y": 24}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (8, 12) while at (10, 17).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 24) while at (12, 24).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 23) while at (12, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 23) while at (11, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (7, 11) while at (8, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (8, 12).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 11) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 77/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 24) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (11, 23) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (12, 24), en route to target (12, 24), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (8, 12), engaging an enemy target at (7, 11), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両機が敵空母を発見・交戦中で優勢。BSQ2が交戦中、BSQ1は帰還中でHP低め。空母は敵機に発見されている（ASQ1/ASQ2の位置が近接）ため、被発見を避けつつ着艦帯を確保する。方針：BC1は少し後退して安全域へ（南東へ1ヘクス）移動し、BSQ1の着艦を確実にする。交戦中のBSQ2は継続して攻撃させ、着弾後帰還へ。発艦は両機展開中のため不可。必要なら次ターンに再発艦して追撃する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 13, "y": 25}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (12, 24).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 27 damage while at (12, 24).
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ2) while at (12, 24).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ2) causing 23 damage while at (12, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (8, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 14 damage while at (8, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (8, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 24) while at (12, 22).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 23) while at (12, 22).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 11) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 53/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 24) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (11, 23) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (12, 24), en route to target (13, 25), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (12, 22), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (8, 12), returning to the carrier, HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母に大打撃を与えたが、自空母BC1が被弾してHP半分。敵航空隊2機は損傷しているが依然空域に存在。両攻撃機は帰還中で着艦が最優先。空母は着艦を確実にするため敵索敵圏からわずかに離脱させ安全に戻す。具体的には空母をさらに南東へ1ヘクス退避し、着艦後に速やかに再発艦して敵空母撃沈を狙う（次ターンの展開を準備）。航行中は索敵情報をもとに敵機の動きを見て追撃経路を決定する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 14, "y": 26}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 21) while at (12, 25).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 21) while at (12, 25).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 21) while at (12, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (11, 20) while at (12, 24).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (7, 10) while at (9, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ1) landed on the carrier while at (12, 25).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 20) while at (10, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (10, 19) while at (10, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 10) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 53/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (12, 20) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (10, 19) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (12, 25), en route to target (14, 26), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (10, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母を発見（7,10）しており、敵HPはまだ53。こちらの艦載機は2機とも帰還／整備可能。敵航空隊はBC1周辺（11-12,19-21）におり発見リスクあり。優先は敵空母撃沈──まずは両機を同一目標に集中発艦して一斉攻撃を行う。だが航続22の範囲を満たすよう着艦地点中心から目標を指定する必要がある。空母は敵索敵圏からやや離して安全に留まりつつ発艦支援するため、現位置を維持して発艦する（移動は控える）。BSQ1とBSQ2を敵空母位置に向けて発艦し集中攻撃、着艦後は被害軽減のため南東へ若干退避を検討。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 10}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (10, 16) while at (11, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (8, 15) while at (11, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (7, 10) while at (13, 25).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 10) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 53/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (10, 16) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (8, 15) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 26), en route to target (14, 26), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 25), outbound toward (7, 10), HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は敵空母へ向かう途中。BSQ2は着艦間近で整備後に再発艦して追撃可能。敵航空隊が我が空母周辺におり被索敵リスクがあるため、BC1は移動を控えて着艦・再発艦支援に備える。現在BSQ2は帰投中なのでまず着艦を確実にさせ、次ターンにBSQ2を再発艦してBSQ1と合流させ敵空母(7,10)へ集中攻撃する。今回は空母を静止（発艦支援）し、BSQ2は着艦中のため行動指示なし。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.


Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 10) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 53/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (10, 16) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (8, 15) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 26), en route to target (14, 26), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 21), outbound toward (7, 10), HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 23), returning to the carrier, HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は(7,10)でHP53。BSQ1が接近中、BSQ2は帰還直後で再発艦可能。敵航空隊はまだ南東寄りにいるため、発見優位は維持したい。方針：まずBC1は現位置維持で発艦帯を確保（移動で索敵されるリスクを避ける）。BSQ2を着艦後すぐ再発艦してBSQ1と合流、目標(7,10)へ同時着弾させ敵空母を撃沈または速やかにHPを削る。航空隊の航続距離制約内なので発艦目標は(7,10)を指定。敵機の脅威が増せば次ターンに空母を後退させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 10}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "現在BSQ1が敵空母へ向かっており、BSQ2は帰還中でまだ艦上にいない（展開中扱い）。発艦命令は出せないため空母は発艦支援のため現位置維持し、BSQ1が到達して攻撃を行い帰還するのを待つ。敵航空隊は周辺に残存しているため着艦時の被害を抑えるため、着艦完了後に空母を安全方向へ若干移動させる計画を立てる（だが今回は移動せず着艦優先）。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (14, 26).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 10) (previously at (8, 12)), HP 53/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (10, 16) (previously at (9, 14)), HP 24/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (8, 15) (previously at (8, 13)), HP 22/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 17), outbound toward (7, 10), HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "BSQ1は敵空母へ接近中。BSQ2は艦上で整備完了。敵空母(7,10)を同時集中攻撃して撃沈を狙うため、BSQ2を直ちに発艦して同目標に向かわせる。空母は現状維持して発艦支援と着艦帯確保を行う。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 10}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (7, 10) while at (13, 25).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 26), en route to target (14, 26), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 13), outbound toward (7, 10), HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 25), outbound toward (7, 10), HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母(7,10)へ両隊が接近中。敵航空隊はまだ我が周辺にいるが、同時攻撃で敵空母を撃沈できる可能性が高い。BC1は発艦支援と着艦安全確保のため現位置維持。両航空隊をそのまま敵空母へ向かわせて集中攻撃を行う。攻撃後は被害状況に応じて空母を安全方向へ移動させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (7, 10).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 26), en route to target (14, 26), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 10), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 21), outbound toward (7, 10), HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1は敵空母に到達し攻撃後帰還中。BSQ2が追撃で接近中。敵機は依然我が周辺にいる可能性が高く、空母は被索敵・被弾リスクを下げるため南東方向へ退避して着艦帯を安全確保する。退避は1ヘクス程度で十分。航空隊は現在行動中のため指示なし。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 15, "y": 27}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (6, 10) while at (9, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (6, 10) (previously at (4, 7)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (15, 27), en route to target (15, 27), HP 50/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 14), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (9, 17), outbound toward (7, 10), HP 26/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母の位置は依然不確定（最後は7,10の報告あり）が、周辺の敵航空隊が活発に動いている。優先は航空隊の帰還保護と次の一斉発艦での確実な撃沈。現状ではBSQ1が低HPで帰還中、BSQ2は敵空母へ接近中。空母は着艦帯の安全確保のため当面は現状維持して着艦を確実に行い、着艦後に両機の整備を終えたら再び敵推定位置（7,10付近）へ集中発艦する計画とする。よって今回の行動は移動せず着艦支援継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 15 of 30.

Recent events:
